column1: Little Goat Diner////I am generally a fan of Stephanie Izard's but have just found the dishes at Little Goat to be bland and oversalted. The Goat Almighty was particularly tragic
column2: an egregious exercise in the "bigger must be better" school of thought. I made several attempts at Little Goat
column3: and the one reliable standby I found were the fried pickles and onion rings.
